Texts.Chs: 我解锁了一项独特的科技——先驱微型球！可以附着墙壁，提升移动速度，按住^green;[FIRE]^reset;引发一次反重力冲击，击晕并击退敌人。它已被装备。
Texts.Eng: I've uncovered a unique tech! The Precursor Microsphere! You get wall-cling, increased movement speed, and pressing ^green;[FIRE]^reset; will cause a Repulsor Blast that stuns and pushes enemies. It has been equipped.
